short_description: Specifies the computational engine for a model
Sets the mode (e.g. classification or regression) for a model
Marks a parameter for tuning in a model
Finalizes the workflow with specific parameters
Adds a model to a workflow
Adds a recipe to a workflow
Tunes hyperparameters across a grid of values
Selects the best tuning parameter combination based on a metric
predicts outcome variable according to a specified model-e.g Predict.lm- predict.glm
splits dataset in test and training and test data
randomly splits data into different folds (for cross validation)
creates a recipe for processing data
calculated the area under the AUC curve
